item.title: Winners VI toolkit scripting contest
item.description: The winners of the VI Toolkit scripting contest are announced: The first prize goes to LucD Dekens for his Guest Provisioning System script. The Second prize goes to tzamora for his VMware Infrastructure Power Documenter script. The Third prize goes to Dan Baskette with his PowerVDI script. The VMware Healthcheck script that I created has not won. Congrats to all the contest winners! You can read the rest @ the VMware PowerShell Blog
